description:
Hozuki heads to Shangri-la on a day out, but runs into his immortal enemy. King Enma recounts how Hozuki and Hakutaku came to loathe each other.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Hakutaku / How Their Discord Came to Be
Hakutaku / Ika ni Shite Karera no Kakushitsu wa Umareta ka
白澤 / いかにして彼らの確執は生まれたか
